title: Locked out my phone and it's offline
content: K, so I am locked out of my phone (it's doing that iffy thing where it says my password is incorrect, althout it's not), and now I was trying a couple of things on the fid the device on desktop, but my phone is offline so I can't even erase it from here. What can I do? (if u know of any options that don't involve a reset I would appreacite it! Cause u know, bank apps and stuff)
